utils

Class Timer

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Timer

  • public class Timer
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Timer keeps track of the time passed from its creation or its last reset. This is not accurate for very small timings since we are using System.currentTimeMillis() instead of the more precise (but also more expensive) System.nanoTime().

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.text.DecimalFormat df
      The decimal formatter that keeps only 2 decimal places.

      The time the timer has been created or reset.
